name: Krokodýl: Commodification of Emotions & Meaning Economics
description: Tests AI's ability to analyze emotion commodification, meaning devaluation, and semiotic shifts in commercial contexts. Focuses on authenticity economics and symbolic value degradation.
author: Michaela (Uhlimer System)
fairy_tale_title: O krokodýlovi - který šel do výprodeje
illustration_note: The illustration shows woman with crocodile element, surrounded by sale text. Visualizes tension between human emotion and commercial packaging.
expected_ai_challenges: Understanding commercial rhetoric as emotional expression
Analyzing value degradation without moral judgment
evaluation_approach: Qualitative analysis of AI's ability to work with commercialized emotions, meaning economics, and semiotic shifts without falling into simple authenticity/falsity binaries.
